title: HiLiTe
summary: Developed a machine learning pipeline that transforms full-length soccer matches into engaging highlight reels with AI-generated commentary.
specifics: Vision pipeline: frame/clip extraction, event detection, and scoring
Commentary generation for key moments with sports-style narration
Synchronization of narration with selected clips for coherent highlights
architecture: Video ingestion → moment scoring → vision features → (VLM-based) narration → timeline assembly/export

title: Personal Portfolio & Iris
summary: Full-stack portfolio built with Next.js and TypeScript featuring Iris — a custom AI assistant that powers conversational navigation and contextual Q&A.
specifics: Iris: Named after the Greek messenger goddess, part of a long-term vision for Mike's AI assistants (Iris for digital, Hermes for physical robot form)
Custom RAG pipeline: embeddings retrieval, semantic search, intent detection, and streaming LLM responses
⌘K command palette for instant search and Iris chat integration
Structured knowledge base with filter queries, year-based filtering, and personal context retrieval
Accessibility-first design with responsive layout and smooth Framer Motion animations
architecture: Next.js 15 (App Router) → RAG backend (embeddings + cosine + intent detection) → GPT streaming → Iris UI (palette + chat)

title: Euros 2024 Predictor
summary: Predicted Euro 2024 outcomes by scraping datasets and training classical ML models; reached ~top 3% in UEFA predictions.
specifics: Feature engineering from fixtures, form, and team stats with Pandas/NumPy
Random Forest classification with CV and hyperparameter tuning
Produced xG-style expectations and discrete scoreline predictions; error analysis and calibration
architecture: Scraper → feature store (CSV/Parquet) → model training (RF) → inference/evaluation notebooks

title: Momentum
summary: SwiftUI iOS app for voice-first productivity: real-time transcription, GPT intent parsing, and adaptive TTS feedback.
specifics: Streaming ASR pipeline with <1s perceived latency
Intent parsing → actions (reminders, calendar, to-dos) via GPT
Low-latency TTS with interruption handling; privacy-aware UX
architecture: Audio capture → ASR → intent (LLM) → action execution → TTS playback; reactive state with SwiftUI

title: BB&N's Knight Life
summary: Native iOS app that streamlined school scheduling at BB&N; widely adopted and rated 4.9★ on the App Store.
specifics: Centralized schedules with reliable local caching and notifications
Continuous releases using student feedback loops
End-to-end App Store deployment and support
architecture: Native iOS app with Firebase backend for sync/messaging; notification scheduling and offline-first caching
